==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|つう|じょう|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|つうじょう|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|y=go}}

===Adjective===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|つうじょう|hhira=つうじやう}}

# [[ordinary]]; [[conventional]]; [[normal]]

====Usage notes====
Although technically a ''na''-type adjective, this is more commonly used as an adjective in compounds, such as those in the '''Derived terms''' section.

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-l|通常国会|つうじょうこっかい|tsūjō kokkai}}: an [[ordinary]] session of the [[Diet]] / [[Parliament]] / [[Congress]]
* {{ja-l|通常選挙|つうじょうせんきょ|tsūjō senkyo}}: an [[ordinary]] [[election]]
* {{ja-l|通常総会|つうじょうそうかい|tsūjō sōkai}}: an [[ordinary]] [[shareholders]] [[meeting]]
* {{ja-l|通常兵器|つうじょうへき|tsūjō heiki}}: [[conventional]] [[weapon]]s
* {{ja-l|通常郵便物|つうじょうゆうびんぶつ|tsūjō yūbinbutsu}}: [[regular]] [[mail]] (i.e. not packages)

===Adverb===
{{ja-pos|つうじょう|adverb|hhira=つうじやう}}

# [[generally]]; [[usually]]; [[commonly]]

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|つうじょう|hhira=つうじやう}}

# the [[usual]] (thing, etc.), the [[norm]]
#* {{quote-journal|year=1935|author=平野憲正, 小林健児 (translation), Josef Baló|doi=10.14828/jsb1895.1935.702|title=濾過性病原体に因る疾病|journal=細菌學雜誌|issue=475|page=705|passage={{ja-usex|種痘の際屡々'''通常'''とは異なった反応が起る。|しゅとう の さい しばしば '''つうじょう''' とは ことなった はんのう が おこる。|In vaccination, reactions different from that under '''the usual''' [circumstances] will occur.}}}}
